title: The heart of Midlothian;
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: " David Deans, sir, the cow-feeder at St. Leonard's Craigs, near Edinburgh."

title: Haco the Dreamer: a tale of Scotch University life
author: Sime, William
snippet: Avhat he is doing; but I may say that he isstudying to be a doctor, and he lives at No. 19Salisbury Street, looking out on the Craigs, and ifyou go to see him, you may be sure he will be gladenough.
